document.full_text: half the international space station crew departed for earth on monday, leaving behind the visiting shuttle endeavour and a parting gift for nasa -- a legacy photograph of the shuttle parked at the orbital outpost.
document.title: russia's parting gift to nasa: shuttle legacy photo
lines_and_colors: half the international space station crew departed for earth on monday, leaving behind the visiting shuttle endeavour and a parting gift for nasa -- a legacy photograph of the shuttle parked at the orbital outpost.
